Grid¶

namespace: VoldeNuit.Framework.MotionPlanning

public class Grid

Grid class for containing map data.

Properties¶


Grid Constants¶

Constants for cell data.

Constant

int value

SOLID

-1

UNDEFINED

-2

x¶

Contains x position of the grid.

public int x;

y¶

Contains y position of the grid.

public int y;

cellwidth¶

Contains width of cell of the grid.

public int cellwidth;

cellheight¶

Contains height of cell of the grid.

public int cellheight;



Methods¶


Grid(int x, int y, int hcells, int vcells, int cellwidth, int cellheight)¶

Constructor. Creates new Grid with properties and returns it.

  • Returns: Grid

Parameter

Type

Desc

x

int

x position of grid.

y

int

y position of grid.

hcells

int

Number of horizontal cells.

vcells

int

Number of vertical cells.

cellwidth

int

Width of cell.

cellheight

int

Height of cell.

 
public Grid(int x, int y, int hcells, int vcells, int cellwidth, int cellheight) {}

this[int h, int v]¶

Gets or Sets value of the cell on position that passed as argument.

  • Returns: dynamic (get => int; set => N/A.)

Parameter

Type

Desc

h

int

Horizontal position of cell.

v

int

Vertical position of cell.

 
public int this[int h, int v] { get; set; }

InitRegion(int x, int y, int width, int height)¶

Sets value of the cells as SOLID within region on room that passed as argument.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

x

int

x position of the region.

y

int

y position of the region.

width

int

Width of the region.

height

int

Height of the region.

 
public void InitRegion(int x, int y, int width, int height) {}

Sets value of the cells as SOLID within region on room that passed as argument.

Parameter

Desc

Rectangle

public void InitInstance(Instance instance, bool precision)¶

Sets value of the cells as SOLID within Instance on room that passed as argument.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

instance

Instance

Reference of the Instance.

precision

bool

Whether check collision based on pixel data of the Instance’s Sprite or not.

 
public void InitInstance(Instance instance, bool precision) {}

Clear()¶

Sets value of all cells as UNDEFINED.

  • Returns: N/A

public void Clear() {}

Destroy()¶

Destroys the grid.

  • Returns: N/A

public void Destroy() {}
